data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Orkla India Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from November 06 2025 the Equity Shares of Orkla India Ltd (Scrip Code: 544595) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251104-dated November 04 2025.
